title: Just 6 Weeks v1.8.5
description:
Just 6 Weeks offers you a unique opportunity to get into shape, learn how to do 100 push-ups or sit-ups, as well as to shape a beautiful muscle profile in only six weeks. 

Forget complicated systems and exhausting, hours-long workouts! All you need now is 10 minutes three times a week, a comfortable spot, and your smartphone.

Just 6 Weeks has a very simple interface with convenient, customizable functionality. Workouts, reminders, statistics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ everything is just two clicks away. Nothing will distract you from the workout now!

5 Programs in one application:

- 100 push-ups
- 200 sit-ups
- 150 dips
- 200 squats
- 20 pull-ups

Simple functionality to reach complicated goals:

- Five independent programs can be used in any combination
- Level selection, depending on the results of a physical fitness test
- Automatic Ã¢â‚¬Å“restÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ timer with custom settings
- Workout schedule with reminders
- Regular adjustments of workout intensity to your level
- Detailed statistics of exercises performed
- Import and export your data
- Interface that does not distract you from you main goal

What's New:

- Added 6 new languagesÃ¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹: Czech, Danish, Turkish, Finnish, Dutch, Norwegian
- Increased the selection of reps in each set
- Fixed a slowdown between sets
- Fixed a slowdown of sound timer
- Increased the overall performance of the app
- Fixed other bugs
